Name: Mimi and Lisa - Adventure for Children
About the game: Mimi and Lisa is a simple 2D adventure game set in the environment of the TV series of the same name, where the player takes on the roles of two characters (Mimi and Lisa). Both characters experience adventurous stories full of joy and fantasy. They solve a variety of simple puzzles and explore different locations that children know from the TV series or from books. Mimi is a magical little girl with her eyes closed. She looks at the world with her sensitive palms, ears and nose. Although Mimi is blind, she is not sad or lonely. She has her carefully tidy room where she feels safe, a kind daddy, and a friend, Lisa, who brings joy and excitement into her orderly world. Who the game is for: For children between the ages of 4 and 9 and for all parents who want their children to learn in a non-traditional video game way. The game was supported by Slovak Arts Council.
